page.title: 13THE ARTISTS
page.content: The small fishing village of Catterline has been the home of at least five artists.Everyone of them has fallen in love with the place as soon as they set eyes on it.It is what you could call an artists haven, the picturesque countryside being the ideal setting for the artists to paint pictures of.We still have one artist living in Catterline who has turned an old house on a cliff into an artists studio.One of the artists who is now dead is said to be one of Scotland's greatest artists.Catterline is an exciting place from an artist's point of view.
